member.name: P:OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderOptions.Providers
member.summary: This read-only collections contains all registered email providers. The 'Key' is the technical name of the provider. The 'Value' is the type of the email provider. The type will always be an implementation of interface.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderOptions.TryAddProvider(System.String,OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderTypeOptions)
member.summary: Adds a provider if one does not exist.
member.param: The technical name of the provider.
The type options of the provider.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderOptions.RemoveProvider(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a provider if one exist.
member.param: The technical name of the provider.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderOptions.ReplaceProvider(System.String,OrchardCore.Email.Core.Services.EmailProviderTypeOptions)
member.summary: Replaces existing or adds a new provider.
member.param: The technical name of the provider.
